#summary RMA Description

= Introduction =

RMA or Robust MultiArray Average is a method commonly used for microarray summarization and normalization. This is one method used by the program [APT] to obtain probeset expression values from analyzed CEL files, in addition to PLIER (not currently used by AltAnalyze). The result of RMA are sample expression values with a near identical distribution of expression values.
